channel.title: Transferring firefox settings from one pc to annother
channel.description: hey i just got a new kick ass pc, i have firefox on my old one with all of the addons, tabs open, bookmarks, bookmark tabs (the ones under your address bar) just how i like it and with a new pc i feel like crying because i miss them in the 1st 2 mins can they all be transferred?

item.title: Transferring firefox settings from one pc to annother

thanks, shoulda seen that one comeing lol. With a new computer i tend to forget to do basic things like search ><

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

http://www.google.co.uk/search?hl=en&q=transfer+firefox+settings+from+one+pc+to+another&btnG=Google+Search&meta=

Pick a link, any link.
